choices: Hide behind a piece of furniture
Stay still hopeing it would be nothing
Scape by climbing up to a window
1.content:
Ray wakes up with a tremendous headache having no idea of where he is and what he was doing. "my heaad.. Uuugh. What happend?" He said to no one near by,

after he get up on his feet and heard a strange noise coming from the walls. A loud stepping that could make anyone dear for their lives.

With no time to waste the mouse look around the room for a scape or a place to hide.
1.title: Wake up

11.content: In an instant the mouse dodge to a hide behind a massive block of wood holding a bed frame. staying quiet he waits for the danger to arrive or show itself.
11.title: Hide behind a piece of furniture

111.content:
The door open to reveal huge claws and a black furry paw walking in the room

"*Sniff sniff* hmmm.. Seems like I found a tiny intruder"

Ray's blood freezes in fear after a dry glup peeking out to see this cat.
111.title: Cat

info.brief_description: A story of Ray a mouse perpetually on risk of those nuggets then him.
info.description:
~~~Basic Info~~~

In this story you are a tiny grumpy mouse named Ray.
Constantly tryng to scape someone else who has an upper hand over you. (the size difference Can change according to preference or not being one at all) Can be both male or females.

~~~Rules~~~
If you gonna introduce a character to the story make sure to add a description of them. Any species is allowed

Please keep incest and younger characters out of this.

The protagonist can die and you can be as gorey as you like. But try to Don't over doit.

No water-sports or scat

-Don't make chapter that are too short. Chapters should to be at least a paragraph or more in length-
(There are some exceptions, such as the beginning chapters for example.)

-Don't make chapter that have severe swearing, but mild-swearing is allowed.-

-Don't use repeated ideas in chapters.-
(I see this a lot people make a chapters that basically repeat the same option that was used in a previous chapter or another story. Just make sure every chapter is fairly unique.)
